parents.title: Contract scope harden: 697a1500-1e34-8321-ae0f-23f6314f1716_0002
parents.description:
TASK: CONTRACT_SCOPE_HARDEN

task_id: 697a1500-1e34-8321-ae0f-23f6314f1716_0002
contract_ref: docs/ssot/04_contracts/generated/697a1500-1e34-8321-ae0f-23f6314f1716_0002.json

Goal:
- Harden this contract so it becomes executable: fill scope_allow + acceptance + stop_condition + commands_hint.

Rules (mandatory):
- You MUST ONLY edit the allowlisted contract file.
- Do NOT search the repo. Do NOT open other files unless absolutely necessary.
- Keep changes minimal and deterministic.
- Acceptance must be executable commands; verifier judges only by acceptance outcomes.
- Output MUST be a patch only (no markdown/code fences, no narration).
- Patch MUST start with `*** Begin Patch` and end with `*** End Patch`.
- Patch MUST contain exactly ONE `*** Update File:` section for the allowlisted contract file.
Example (shape only):
*** Begin Patch
*** Update File: docs/ssot/04_contracts/generated/<task_id>.json
@@
-  "scope_allow": "TBD"
+  "scope_allow": ["docs/CANONICAL/PROGRESS.md"]
*** End Patch

Minimum required fields to ensure:
- goal / scope_allow / constraints / acceptance.checks[] / stop_condition / commands_hint / inputs_ref / outputs_expected

Task label / hint: WebGPT user message 0002
